resources.string: " 1. You can play this game in two modes -English to Spanish -Spanish to English 2. You can change the mode from below before starting the game 3. Question word will change after five falling words 4. Tap “Correct” button if the falling word is a correct translation 5. Tap “Wrong” button if the falling word is a wrong translation 6. For one correct answer score will be +100 7. For one wrong answer score will be -50 8. For no answer penalty will -100 of score 9. Total five lives available 10. Good luck!"
